thread.section_title: School Stream - School Communication App Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of School Stream - School Communication App | schoolstream.com.au
thread.title: Tara
thread.title_full: School Stream - School Communication App reviewed by Tara

author: Tara
title: Tara
text:
We have been able to minimise the 'paper trail' and increase the fluency of communication with families through School Stream.
Information is delivered the families instantly to their mobile devices.
The forms are handy for families to communicate with the service also :)
We use the School Stream app, which is embedded into the back end of our WordPress site, every day to share our children's day.
The training when we commenced School Stream was fluent and effective.
There are a few bugs in the site, but the team are very efficient and responsive to any and all issues we have encountered :)
We love it :)
